source_sentence: Aurora has interests in uranium-focused assets in Australia and the USA, including the Aurora Uranium Project (AUP) in southeast Oregon-the USA's largest mineable, measured and indicated uranium deposit (MRE: 107.3Mt @ 214ppm U3O8 for 50.6 Mlbs U3O8).
resource_context: Aurora Uranium Project (AUP) - Measured and Indicated Resource
